name: shell-ts
description: Fluent, unix like interface for file system

scripts.test:all: mkdir -p temp & mocha test -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test: mkdir -p temp & mocha test -r ts-node/register test/**/fgrep.spec.ts
scripts.test:debug: mkdir -p temp & mocha test -r ts-node/register test/**/fgrep.spec.ts --inspect-brk
